Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION Cycle Time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after the execution of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in variants that include Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION occurs

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in variants that proceed directly to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in cases where Payment Handled occurs within 30 days of Request Payment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Payment Handled occurs

Name: Minimum time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in high-frequency variants (frequency > 100)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in variants involving budget owner approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in successful reimbursement paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in 2018 data
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
